requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Most Linux distributions should work)
  • Processor: Intel i5 (2014 or newer)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 650M / AMD Radeon R7
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 750 Ti / AMD RX 550
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel i5 (2014 or newer)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 650M / AMD Radeon R7
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor AMD Athlon Silver 3050U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K / Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 750 Ti / AMD RX 550
